items.sentence: It was never hard for us to find something to talk about.
May I ask why it is that you don't want to talk about it?
It's no use going to school if you're not going to study.
Tom and Mary announced the dissolution of their marriage.
Tom has been trying to talk his father into buying a car.
Would it be OK if I told Tom that he didn't have to come?
We probably won't be able to move this without some help.
Fortunately, I cut the red wire instead of the green one.
Tom has asked Mary to watch his dog while he's in Boston.
Tom is one of the best saxophonists that I've ever heard.
